import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import bgImage from "./bg.png"; // Background Image import userProfile from "./user-profile.jpg"; // Replace with actual profile picture const feedbacks = [ { id: 1, name: "Floyd Miles", feedback: "Amet minim mollit non deserunt ullamco est sit aliqua dolor do amet sint. Velit officia consequat duis enim velit mollit.", rating: 4, image: "/user1.jpg", }, { id: 2, name: "Ronald Richards", feedback: "ullamco est sit aliqua dolor do amet sint. Velit officia consequat duis enim velit mollit.", rating: 5, image: "/user2.jpg", }, { id: 3, name: "Savannah Nguyen", feedback: "Amet minim mollit non deserunt ullamco est sit aliqua dolor do amet sint.", rating: 4, image: "/user3.jpg", }, ]; const Profile = () => { const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); return (
{/* Navbar */}

Uni Earn

Home Company Profile Activities Contact Logout
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome, Mohamed

{/* Profile Card */}

Aathif Mohamed

aathifmohamed2000@gmail.com

{/* Editable Form */}
{/* Company Feedback Section */}

Company Feedback

{feedbacks.map((feedback) => (

{feedback.name}

{"⭐".repeat(feedback.rating)}

{feedback.feedback}

))}
); }; export default Profile;
